thread.title: Celebs Come Out for Super Bowl 51 Pre Parties (PHOTO GALLERY)
thread.title_full: Celebs Come Out for Super Bowl 51 Pre Parties (PHOTO GALLERY)

author: TMZ Staff
title: Celebs Come Out for Super Bowl 51 Pre Parties (PHOTO GALLERY)
text:
Celebs Come Out for Super Bowl 51 Pre Parties Super Bowl Weekend Celebs Pour In For Houston Parties 2/4/2017 9:49 AM PST 
Houston doubled as Hollywood Friday night ... with a TON of celebs partying throughout the city. 
Bruno Mars and Fergie kicked off the festivities with performances at the ESPN and LIFEWTR parties ... and Tim Tebow , French Montana , John Legend and DJ Khaled made appearances of their own at different events through the night. 
Can't imagine Saturday will be any less wild. A video posted by Kris (@texas.favorite.son) on Feb 4, 2017 at 9:43am PST
